Actor - Class in platform.game
Base class of all simulated actors, attached to a world.

Base constructor of an Actor.

Secondary constructor of an Actor.
actor - Variable in class platform.game.button.Spawn
Spawns the Actor stored in this variable
actors - Variable in class platform.game.Simulator
List containing all current Actors.

Translates this box.

addSignal(Signal) - Method in interface platform.game.Linkable
Adds the signal to the Linkable.
addSignal(Signal) - Method in class platform.game.linkable.Door
The following method has to be overridden to unregister all the signals it contains so it can be loaded in the new world and be visible.

Angle of the gravity, 0.0 being the normal one.

Arrow represents an Actor dealing ARROW type damages.

ArrowDispenser(Box) - Constructor for class platform.game.weapon.ArrowDispenser

ASSETS(World, Box, String, int) - Static method in class platform.game.button.SuperSpawner
Gives a SuperSpawner containing Spawns of Assets.
ASSETS(World, Box, int) - Static method in class platform.game.button.SuperSpawner
Gives a SuperSpawner containing Spawns of Assets without specifying a Sprite.
ASSETS(World, Box) - Static method in class platform.game.button.SuperSpawner
